name: Megaman L.e.w.d. System
description:
WARNING

This game is not suited for those under the age of 18
All character in this game are fictional, consenting adults.
This is a non-profit hentai game made for personal enjoyment if you paid for it you got ripped off.
This game doesn't contain nudity and sexual intercourse as of now but will include these and more in the future (even futanari).
If dislike that content or feel offended by any of the content, DO NOT CONTINUE.

The Megaman LEWD System is a short exploration/dress up game based on the megaman series.

It's in an early alpha stage for now and was developped in a few days, more content and enhancement will happend in the near future, for now this is the released effort for the first year anniversary of my daily content (@lonnesdev on twitter)

The manual is included aswell as one character : Roll caskett. The goal is to find Energy pellet and Weapon energy which you can then useto modify Roll.

Most art and visuals will be subject to upgrades and repolishing aswell as some revision ot the gameplay.

You can see more of my work here : https://linkr.in/Akihasu_Senpai
